title: Travel time increase on the Circle Line due to maintenance

title_translations.zh-Hans: 环线因维修导致出行时间增加
title_translations.ms: Peningkatan masa perjalanan di Laluan Bulatan kerana penyelenggaraan
title_translations.ta: பராமரிப்பு காரணமாக வட்டப் பாதையில் பயண நேரம் அதிகரிப்பு

updates.text: [CCL]CLEARED: Train services between Caldecott & HollandVillage are now operating normally. http://t.co/Wo7S6s3JZs
[CCL]: Expect longer travel time(~15) between Caldecott & HollandVillage stations due to power cable change. http://t.co/Wo7S6s3JZs
[CCL] On 23 Jun, 6-10am, travel time between Caldecott & HollandVillage will be longer due to power cable change. http://t.co/Wo7S6s3JZs
[CCL] On 23 Jun, 6-10am, travel time between Caldecott & HollandVillage will be longer due to power cable change. http://t.co/Wo7S6s3JZs
